name: Blockchain Fundamental Course
discription: This is a series of Blockchain tutorials which is designed specifically for college students. I tried to simplify the course as much as possible so that students understand the tech in a very simple manner.

topics.title: Course overview and onboarding
topics.description: In this video I will provide the overview of course.

topics.title: Web Technology
topics.description: In this video I will talk about Webpage, website and Web technology

topics.title: Client-Server, 3 Tier
topics.description: In this video I will talk about client-server model, 3tier architecture

topics.title: Centralised System
topics.description: In this video I will talk about centralised systems, its advantages and disadvantages.

topics.title: Trust & Problem
topics.description: In this video I will talk about Trust and Problem with trust

topics.title: Peer to Peer Model
topics.description: In this video I will talk about P2P model, how it is different from client-server model? Advantages etc.
